#summary The title attribute represents advisory information about an element.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DivElement <div> element] > *title attribute*

== Usage ==

Most browsers display the `title` attribute as a tooltip when you move the cursor over the element.

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `title` attribute on any element.
